content: leah michelle designs leahmdesigns@gmail com snakes & ladders washcloth like the boxy dishcloth this cloth is knit in a 4 stitch and 4 row repeated pattern the ripple snake and column ladder effect of this pattern gives this cloth its fun name slipping the first stitch and purling the last stitch of each row keeps the cloth square and flat and when knit in bright colours it makes a great bath time washcloth for the kids yarn stitch guide bernat handicrafter cotton 100% cotton 80 yd 73 m /50 grams 1 skein shown in #27444 snakes & ladders pattern mod pink #27111 mod blue #13712 hot green #00097 soft violet row 1 ws sl1 kwise k1 p1 *k3 p1 repeat from * to last 2 sts k1 p1 needles row 2 rs sl1 kwise knit to last st p1 one pair size 8 5 mm needles or size needed row 3 sl1 kwise *k3 p1 repeat from * to end to obtain gauge row 4 sl1 kwise knit to last st p1 gauge 8 sts and 14 row = 2 inches in snakes & repeat row 1-­ 4 for patt ladders pattern measurements knitting instructions approximately 10 inches wide and 10 5 inches long before washing the washcloth will shrink cast on 41 sts knit 1 row slipping the first st kwise in the wash especially in the length and purling the last washing instructions work row 1 -­ 4 of snakes & ladders pattern see machine wash and dry stitch guide 18 times bind off all sts weave in ends copyright 2012 2010 by leah michelle designs this pattern photos and products made from this pattern are intended for private use only and may not be distributed for commercial purposes without the written consent of the designer
